submission:
class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, A: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(A)
        ans = 0
        dic = defaultdict(int)

        for i in range(n):
            tmp = defaultdict(int)
            for e in dic:
                if e&A[i] == k: ans += dic[e]
                tmp[e&A[i]] += dic[e]
            tmp[A[i]] += 1
            if A[i] == k: ans += 1
            dic = tmp

        return ans
